data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge, Android 6.0.1, Discord 3.5.1
data.actual_result: Strange abstract depiction of Grant Permission box, along with inability to press the Grant Permission button.
data.expected_result: Grant Permission box pops up, still able to interact with it
data.steps_to_repro: - Deny Discord permission to use Camera from phone settings - Head into app, use camera feature - Hit Grant Permission - Deny on “Allow Discord to take picture and record video?” - Observe
